description: Frontend UI for inventory item management with SRD integration

userStories.title: Inventory Dashboard Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see my inventory overview after logging in.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch inventory data on mount using slug from URL
Show currency summary (CP, SP, GP, PP) in a card
Handle 401: redirect to home with error message
Create useInventory(slug) query hook in api/inventories.ts

userStories.title: Items List with Category Tabs
userStories.description: As a user, I want to browse my items organized by category.
acceptanceCriteria: Tab bar: All, Equipment, Potions, Scrolls, Consumables, Misc
Clicking tab filters items by type
Search input for filtering by name
Empty state when no items (with Add button prompt)
Create useItems(slug, filters) query hook in api/items.ts
Show item count badge on each tab

userStories.title: Item Card Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see item previews in a visually appealing card format.
acceptanceCriteria: Thumbnail placeholder (or actual image if thumbnail_url exists)
Rarity indicator: colored border or badge
Key stats preview based on type (damage/AC/healing)
Click handler prop for opening details
Rarity colors: common=gray, uncommon=green, rare=blue, very_rare=purple, legendary=orange, artifact=red

userStories.title: Add Item Modal with SRD Search
userStories.description: As a user, I want to add items by searching the SRD or entering custom items.
acceptanceCriteria: Name input with SRD autocomplete dropdown (debounced search)
Selecting SRD item auto-populates all fields
Manual entry mode for custom items
Properties section (dynamic fields based on type)
Create useSrdSearch(query) hook in api/srd.ts with 300ms debounce
Success: close modal, refresh items list

userStories.title: Item Detail View
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see full details of an item.
acceptanceCriteria: Type-specific sections: Equipment (damage, AC, properties), Potion (healing, duration), Scroll (spell info)

userStories.title: Edit/Delete Item
userStories.description: As a user, I want to modify or remove items from my inventory.
acceptanceCriteria: Pre-populate form with existing item data
Delete confirmation dialog with item name
Create useUpdateItem(slug, itemId) mutation in api/items.ts
Create useDeleteItem(slug, itemId) mutation in api/items.ts
